projects.title: Shikkha Somaponi Utshob 45
projects.description: Orchestrated branding and digital infrastructure for 2,000+ students at Jahangirnagar University.
projects.content: Jahangirnagar University's 45th batch needed a unified digital identity. As the Lead Strategist, I orchestrated the entire branding campaign, focusing on a 'Cyber-Heritage' aesthetic. We managed logistics for 2,000+ students and deployed a digital portal for event registration, creating a seamless experience from online to offline.

projects.title: Dokan OS
projects.description: Retail automation engine featuring a localized AI sales bot and inventory management.
projects.content: Dokan OS is designed to solve the chaos of F-Commerce in Bangladesh. The core innovation is the 'Banglish AI' bot, capable of understanding mixed Bengali-English queries. By integrating directly with WhatsApp API, we automated 60% of customer interactions, allowing small business owners to focus on growth rather than repetitive replies.

projects.title: Vabuuk Creative Studio
projects.description: A digital sage tool fused with Google NotebookLM for philosophy-driven content engineering.
projects.content: Vabuuk is where Philosophy meets Engineering. Using Google's NotebookLM, I created a 'Digital Sage' that processes complex philosophical texts and converts them into digestible, 'Cyber-Noir' aesthetic content. It stands as a testament to how AI can augment human creativity rather than replace it.
